summary: A country and western singer on a trip through the Tennessee mountains runs into a reclusive backwoodsman, and a witch.
cast: Dolly Parton|Lee Majors|Bo Hopkins|Dan Hedaya|Anita Morris|Danny Cooksey|Gennie James|Chad Sheets|Marc D. Robinson|Daryl Bartley|Ashley Bank|Micah Rowe|David Ackroyd|Rene Auberjonois|Douglas Seale|Rance Howard|Jeanne Hepple|Linda Hoy|Carl Franklin|Chris Nash|Claude Earl Jones|Marc Flanagan|Jean Speegle Howard|Debra Christofferson|Clint Parton|Bryan Seaver|Paula Abdul|Henry W. Laster|John Ritter
title: A Smoky Mountain Christmas
